description.english: Jane finally arrived in my room
description.russian: Джейн наконец пришла в мою комнату
description.brazilian: Jane finalmente chegou no meu quarto

description.schinese: 快乐的女孩，幸福的生活

description.english: Guess I am a good boyfriend
description.turkish: İyi bir erkek arkadaş olduğumu düşünüyorum
description.brazilian: Acho que sou um bom namorado

description.english: That must be some kind of a superpower
description.turkish: Bu bir tür süper güç olsa gerek
description.brazilian: Isso deve ser algum tipo de superpoder

description.english: So good to see Eve after all this time
description.schinese: 这么久后再次见到伊芙真好
description.russian: Так приятно видеть Еву спустя столько времени
description.turkish: Bunca zamandan sonra Eve'i görmek çok güzel
description.brazilian: Tão bom ver a Eve depois de todo esse tempo

description.english: Nice to see them-YOU, I meant you!
description.schinese: 很高兴见到她们—不，是你，我是说你！
description.russian: Приятно их видеть... ТЕБЯ, я имел в виду тебя!
description.brazilian: Bom ver elas—VOCÊ, eu quis dizer você!

description.english: Hmm... Maybe I should knock next time
description.russian: Хм... Может быть, в следующий раз стоит постучать
description.turkish: Hmm... Belki bir dahaki sefere kapıyı çalmalıyım
description.brazilian: Hmm... Talvez eu devesse bater na porta da próxima vez

displayName.turkish: Bir beyefendi her zaman kapıyı çalar
displayName.brazilian: Um cavalheiro sempre bate na porta

description.schinese: 女孩们到了——等下，女孩们？！

description.english: Going through Kiara's stuff is interesting
description.schinese: 翻看基亚拉的东西很有趣
description.brazilian: Mexer nas coisas da Kiara é interessante

description.english: Unlocking the Master Bedroom is easy
description.turkish: Ebeveyn Yatak Odasının kilidini açmak kolaydır
description.brazilian: Destrancar o Quarto Principal é fácil

description.schinese: 千万别拿走女人的手机
description.russian: Никогда не забирай у женщины ее мобильник
description.turkish: Asla bir kadının cep telefonunu alma
description.brazilian: Nunca pegue o celular de uma mulher

description.english: You don't need that with me around...
description.russian: Когда я рядом, тебе это не нужно...
description.brazilian: Você não precisa disso comigo por perto...

description.english: If you can't sleep, leave it on repeat
description.schinese: 如果你睡不着，就重复播放
description.brazilian: Se não consegue dormir, deixe no repeat

description.english: Focus and dedication, nothing can stop me
description.schinese: 专注和奉献，没有什么能阻止我
description.russian: Сосредоточенность и преданность делу, ничто не может меня остановить
description.turkish: Odaklanma ve özveri, hiçbir şey beni durduramaz
description.brazilian: Foco e dedicação, nada pode me parar

description.english: I know phones, they have pictures
description.russian: Я знаю о телефонах все, там точно есть фотографии
description.brazilian: Eu conheço celulares, eles têm fotos

description.english: Wanted to be Jamey Bond, but failed...
description.schinese: 想成为詹姆斯·邦德，但失败了……
description.russian: Хотел быть Джейми Бондом, но не получилось...
description.turkish: Jamey Bond olmak istedim ama başaramadım...
description.brazilian: Queria ser James Bond, mas falhei...

description.english: Flashbacks of time back at Normandy '44
description.schinese: 回想起1944年诺曼底的时光

description.english: Well, you didn't have to read it, but at least you're not sharing it with others... or?
description.schinese: 嗯，你本不必读它，但至少你没与他人分享……是吗？
description.russian: Ну, можно было и не читать, но ты же не поделишься этим с другими... или?
description.turkish: Okumak zorunda değilsin ama en azından başkalarıyla paylaşmıyorsun... veya?
description.brazilian: Bem, você não precisava ter lido, mas pelo menos não está compartilhando com outros... ou está?

description.english: I guess you had to tell her... SNITCH
description.schinese: 我猜你不得不告诉她……告密者
description.russian: Я думаю, ты должен был сказать ей... ЯБЕДА
description.brazilian: Acho que você teve que contar a ela... DEDO-DURO

description.english: You can't say no to a crae-crae
description.schinese: 你无法对一个疯狂的人说不
description.brazilian: Você não pode dizer não a uma maluquinha

description.english: Good manners go a long way!
description.turkish: İyi davranışlar uzun bir yol kat eder!

description.english: I don't need my hands, I've got something better on my mind
description.schinese: 我不需要用手，我有更好的想法
description.russian: Мне не нужны руки, у меня есть кое-что получше
description.turkish: Ellerime ihtiyacım yok, aklımda daha iyi bir şey var
description.brazilian: Não preciso das minhas mãos, tenho algo melhor em mente

description.schinese: 拿着手机的女孩很危险
秘密无法逃过我的眼睛

description.english: There are more ways to pleasure a woman
description.schinese: 取悦女人的方式有很多
description.russian: Есть еще способы доставить удовольствие женщине
description.turkish: Bir kadını memnun etmenin çok fazla yolu var
description.brazilian: Há mais maneiras de dar prazer a uma mulher

description.english: Forgive her Father, for she has sinned
description.schinese: 原谅她吧，父亲，因为她犯了罪
description.russian: Прости ее Отец, ибо она согрешила
description.turkish: Bağışla onu baba, çünkü günah işledi

description.english: I have a thing for shy girls
description.schinese: 我对害羞的女孩情有独钟
description.brazilian: Eu tenho uma queda por garotas tímidas

description.schinese: 没有什么比一个有决心的女人更棒的了

description.english: You're really flexible... Or are you?
description.brazilian: Você é realmente flexível... Ou é?

description.english: Hey, I just met you, and this is crazy
description.schinese: 嘿，我刚认识你，这太疯狂了
description.russian: Эй, я только что встретил тебя, и это безумие
description.turkish: Hey, seninle yeni tanıştım ve bu çok çılgınca
description.brazilian: Ei, acabei de te conhecer, e isso é loucura

displayName.english: When you wish upon a star
displayName.brazilian: Quando você deseja a uma estrela

description.schinese: 没有什么请求是太过分的
description.russian: Ни одно желание не бывает слишком сложным

description.english: Way that you cheer and scream for me
description.schinese: 你为我欢呼和尖叫的方式
description.russian: Способ, которым ты болеешь за меня
description.turkish: Benim için tezahürat yapıp çığlık atıyorsun
description.brazilian: O jeito que você torce e grita por mim

description.english: Consult a doctor before beginning an exercise regime
description.schinese: 开始锻炼计划前请咨询医生
description.russian: Проконсультируйтесь с врачом перед началом тренировок
description.turkish: Egzersiz rejimine başlamadan önce bir doktora danışın
description.brazilian: Consulte um médico antes de iniciar um regime de exercícios
A obediência é sua própria recompensa

description.english: Rules are meant to be broken
description.russian: Правила созданы для того, чтобы их нарушать
description.brazilian: As regras existem para serem quebradas
Papéis de parede rosa são os melhores!

description.english: And they said this wouldn't be a walk in the park
description.schinese: 他们说这不会轻而易举
description.russian: И они говорили, что это не будет легкой прогулкой по парку
description.turkish: Ve bunun parkta yürüyüş olmayacağını söylediler
description.brazilian: E eles disseram que isso não seria fácil

description.english: You did it! You actually did it!
description.schinese: 你成功了！你真的做到了！
description.russian: Ты сделал это! Ты действительно сделал это!

description.schinese: 说再见并不总是容易的
description.brazilian: Dizer adeus nem sempre é fácil
